description:
A sociably proportioned table, with corner angles chosen to make meetings
less angular. Meeting is also happily used as a desk, where you can add
castors for easy rearranging. Slotting together in the same way as little
cousin [Café][], it can also be taken apart and flattened for easy transport.

It's perfect for hosting meetings for up to eight people, or as a workstation
for four or possibly five people at a push. The suggested minimum space for one
Meeting table is around 15 square metres (165 sqft) or 27 square metres (300 sqft)
for two.

[Café]: /designs/cafe
name: Meeting
